frame.name: Predicament
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in an undesirable <fen>Situation</fen>, whose <fen>Explanation</fen> may also be expressed.
<ex><fex name="Exp">The insurers</fex> <m>ended up</m> <m>in</m> the <t>bind</t> <fex name="Sit">of having to pay 15 years' taxes</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Exp">He</fex> <m>was</m> <m>in</m> a bit of a <fex name="Situation"><t>pickle</t></fex> and make no mistake!</ex>
<ex>What a <fex name="Situation"><t>mess</t></fex> <fex name="Exp">we</fex> <m>'re</m> <m>in</m> <fex name="Time">now</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in an undesirable <fen>Situation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Exp">The insurers</fex> <m>ended up</m> <m>in</m> a <t>bind</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Situation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the undesirable <fen>Situation</fen> the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in. <ex>They found themselves <m>in</m> a quite <fex name="Situation">a fix</fex>.</ex> <ex>The company <m>was</m> definitely <m>in</m> <fex name="Situation">dire straits</fex> from the dollar's inflation.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> of the <fen>Situation</fen>.
<ex>We 're in this <t>mess</t> <fex name="Explanation">from paying too little attention to quality control</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>Thiis FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Situation</fen> is in effect.
<ex><fex name="Time">Yesterday's</fex> <t>predicament</t> was a little too exciting.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Situation</fen> occurs.
<ex>The <t>trouble</t> <fex name="pla">in America</fex> is only going to get worse.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Domain</fen> in which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has the problem.</def-root>
